Projects.title: Oasis Capstone
Projects.info: My final New Media Design project centered around the phrase "Do Good". We created an interactive meditation experience where users get to follow along with a breathing exercise and see how their breathing effects some generated art.

Projects.title: ABC's of Symbiosis
Projects.info: A project where we were tasked with designing and printing an ABC related print piece for children. We decided on creating a card game centered around symbiotic relationships in nature and each member in the group was given letters to design.

Projects.title: Wegmans Weather Application
Projects.info: A weather management and monitoring application designed for Wegmans Food Markets to aid in informing store managers and other VIPS of potentially hazardous weather conditions that could require planning and prep.

Projects.title: Demo Reel
Projects.info: A reel dedicated to my favorite work produced during my career as a designer both from internships and school.

Projects.title: 3D Design
Projects.info: Showcase of my 3D renderings and artworks created for class and just for fun.

Projects.title: Chore Management
Projects.info: A TV application for family or personal chore management. It is a new take on TV UI and UI in general using physically based renderings inplace of common flat UI design.

Projects.title: Coin Care
Projects.info: Coin Care is an application that helps users manage their money by first managing their stresses around finances.
